entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 1:16 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
